content:
"""
I notice we need to place the inserter exactly at the drill's drop position and rotate it to face the furnace. Let's try a more precise approach:
"""

# First craft the burner inserter
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter, 1)
print("Crafted burner inserter")

# Get our reference entities
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0]

# Calculate exact position for inserter
inserter_position = Position(x=drill.drop_position.x, y=drill.drop_position.y)
print(f"Calculated inserter position at {inserter_position}")

# Move to position
move_to(inserter_position)
print(f"Moved to position")

# Place inserter exactly at the drop position
inserter = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    position=inserter_position,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT  # Start facing right towards furnace
)
print(f"Placed inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Add fuel to inserter
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=1)
print("Added fuel to inserter")

# Print detailed position information for debugging
print(f"\nPosition Analysis:")
print(f"Drill position: {drill.position}")
print(f"Drill drop position: {drill.drop_position}")
print(f"Inserter position: {inserter.position}")
print(f"Inserter pickup position: {inserter.pickup_position}")
print(f"Inserter drop position: {inserter.drop_position}")
print(f"Furnace position: {furnace.position}")

# Check status
print(f"\nStatus Check:")
print(f"Drill status: {drill.status}")
print(f"Inserter status: {inserter.status}")
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace.status}")

# Print any warnings
print(f"\nWarnings:")
if hasattr(drill, 'warnings'):
    print(f"Drill warnings: {drill.warnings}")
if hasattr(inserter, 'warnings'):
    print(f"Inserter warnings: {inserter.warnings}")
if hasattr(furnace, 'warnings'):
    print(f"Furnace warnings: {furnace.warnings}")

print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
